dsl.content: 1 ][ +2 inf. horiz. 2 ][₍₎][ +2 inf. desc. cum horiz. coniuncta, inf. vest., inf. desc., (ϲ, ο, ω) 3 ][]ι̣τ̣οιϲι[]γε[ +2 sup. vest., (α, λ, δ) 4 ]α̣ιζε̣ι[₍₎][ +2 (κ, ν), inf. vest., med. et inf. vest., (κ, ιϲ) 5 ]ιϲε̣[₍₎]ντα[ +2 med. uncus et dext. arcus sicut ω, ν, (ω, ο) 6 ] +2 (α, λ, δ) 9 χ̣[ sup. sin. arcus ][ +1 (ρ, β, ο) 11 init. sub lineam signum sicut diple fortasse dispicitur [ vert. 17 ]α[ +1 (λ, α) 19 ][ +1 (ε, ϲ), (χ, α, λ, δ) 20 ]δ[ +1 (ε, ο)
